Docs.param: Reference to the Microsoft.Azure.Management.RecoveryServices.Backup.IContainerOperations.
Required. Resource group name of your recovery services vault.
Required. Nme of your recovery services vault.
Required. Request header parameters.
Optional. Fabric name for the protection containers.
Docs.summary: The Begin Refresh Operation triggers an operation in the service which would discover all the containers in the subscription that are ready to be protected by your Recovery Services Vault. This is an asynchronous operation. To determine whether the backend service has finished processing the request, call Get Refresh Operation Result APIs.
Docs.returns: Base recovery job response for all the asynchronous operations.

Required. Name of your recovery services vault.
Required. Name of the protection container to unregister.
Optional. Request header parameters.
Docs.summary: The Begin Unregister Operation unregisters the given container from your Recovery Services Vault. This is an asynchronous operation. To determine whether the backend service has finished processing the request, call Get Container Operation Result API.
Docs.returns: A standard service response including an HTTP status code and request ID.
